scripts.dev:android: CAPACITOR_ENV_PLATFORM=android pnpm --filter @gruenerator/web build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.dev:ios: CAPACITOR_ENV_PLATFORM=ios pnpm --filter @gruenerator/web build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.build:android: CAPACITOR_ENV_PLATFORM=android pnpm --filter @gruenerator/web build && npx cap sync android && npx cap build android
scripts.build:ios: CAPACITOR_ENV_PLATFORM=ios pnpm --filter @gruenerator/web build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap build ios
